title: Pixel 4 Google app battery drain.
content:
Guys,

Since yesterday, the Google app is using a lot of battery on my Pixel 4.

I charged it to 100% and went to bed, woke up in the morning with 70%, all that had been running according to the phone was Google.

I had closed all apps prior to going to sleep, and had an alarm set on the phone.

Is anyone else getting this?
